reporter_caption.center: IN RE ESTATE OF STOLBERG, 468 Mich. 913 (2003)

caption.center: In re Estate of WILLIAM E. STOLBERG, Deceased.
DONALD W. STOLBERG, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. ANN B. STOLBERG,

opinion.opinion_text:
COA: 226471, Oakland Probate C: 99-267772-CZ
On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal from the November 22, 2002 decision of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
